Invocation Name: my water purifier
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Use this voice skill as the accompanying tool for monitoring filtered water quality and tracking filter life for your Purlette water filtration systems. 

To get started, enable the skill and link your Purlette account. 

Try these simple voice commands:

• Alexa, launch my water purifier. System status.
• Alexa, launch my water purifier. Should I replace the filters?
• Alexa, launch my water purifier. Set name to “Home”.
• Alexa, launch my water purifier. List Devices.

You can also give Alexa more detailed commands:

• Alexa, ask my water purifier for a system summary.
• Alexa, ask my water purifier if I need to change the filters.
• Alexa, ask my water purifier how's my drinking water quality.
• Alexa, ask my water purifier to set name to “Office“
• Alexa, ask my water purifier how much life is remaining in the filters.

The My Purlette Water Purifier Skill is not a 'smart home' skill and thus does not support creation of routines.

My Water Purifier voice skill only supports devices linked to a primary user's own Purlette account, not shared devices.

This skill requires a valid Purlette mobile app account with a connected device to access real-time information from your Purlette water filtration systems. My Purlette Water Purifier Skill works with PL400G model Purlette systems. For additional help, please visit https://purlette.com/pages/alexa.
